survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric bicycle commuters to understand their satisfaction levels, challenges faced, and areas for improvement in urban commuting.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an electric bicycle for commuting?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use an electric bicycle for commuting?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons you chose an electric bicycle for commuting? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Cost savings compared to cars or public transport
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes. Include common motivators for e-bike usage.

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons you chose an electric bicycle for commuting? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Cost savings compared to cars or public transport

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your electric bicycle?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your electric bicycle?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face while commuting with an electric bicycle? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question. Include common challenges faced by e-bike commuters.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face while commuting with an electric bicycle? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any additional challenges or suggestions for improving electric bicycle commuting in your city.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Please describe any additional challenges or suggestions for improving electric bicycle commuting in your city.
